      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DbSaveBuilderContext<Long> DbTableContext.newSaveBuilder​(String idColumn, Long idValue)
      Creates a DbSaveBuilderContext which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.

      Creates a DbSaveBuilderContext which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.

      Creates a DbSaveBuilderContext which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.
